rules_text:
Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then exile this spell.
Whenever you discard this card, you may pay {U}{U} and exile it. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

OG_1:
Return target instant card and target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then exile Eldritch Retrieval.
Whenever you discard Eldritch Retrieval, you may pay UU and exile it. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
